items.name: Addy Osmani
items.title: Senior Staff Eng. Manager, Chrome
items.text: ESLint has been critical in helping developers write high-quality JavaScript for years. We love that it catches common issues early and often. With a high level of extensibility, ESLint's ability to let teams enforce custom rules that work for them has been excellent for open-source projects and more.

items.name: Addy Osmani
items.title: Senior Staff Eng. Manager, Chrome
items.text: ESLint has been critical in helping developers write high-quality JavaScript for years.

items.name: Addy Osmani
items.title: Senior Staff Eng. Manager, Chrome
items.text: ESLint has been critical in helping developers write high-quality JavaScript for years. We love that it catches common issues early and often. With a high level of extensibility, ESLint's ability to let teams enforce custom rules that work for them has been excellent for open-source projects and more. Chrome is happy to sponsor ESLint to help web developers write consistently high-quality code. It's an essential piece of the modern web development toolkit.
